Getting the day’s name in TSQL

Posted by karlseguin on April 19, 2006

Surely there’s got to be an easier than this, but so far it’s the best I’ve got:

ALTER FUNCTION GetWeekdayName
(
   @Weekday INT
)
RETURNS VARCHAR(9)
AS
BEGIN
   DECLARE @temp INT,
           @return VARCHAR(9)

   SET @temp = @@DATEFIRST + @Weekday
   IF (@temp > 7) BEGIN
      SET @temp = @temp – 7
   END

   SELECT
      @return = CASE @temp
         WHEN 1 THEN ‘Sunday’
         WHEN 2 THEN ‘Monday’
         WHEN 3 THEN ‘Tuesday’
         WHEN 4 THEN ‘Wednesday’
         WHEN 5 THEN ‘Thursday’
         WHEN 6 THEN ‘Friday’
         WHEN 7 THEN ‘Saturday’
      END

   RETURN @return
END

This ought to work regarldess of the DATEFIRST setting
